#include<stdio.h>
 
#define M 100000000000007
 
unsigned long long int cat[10001];
unsigned long long int mot[10001];
unsigned long long int inv[10007];
 
long long int multi(long long int a)
{
	long long int i=M,v=0,d=1,t,x;
	while(a>0)
	{
		t=i/a;
		x=a;
		a = i%x;
		i=x;
		x=d;
		d=v-t*x;
		v=x;
	}
	if(i > 1)	return 0;
	if(v > 0)	return v;
	else		return v+M;
}
 
long long int mul(long long int n,long long int m)
{
	long long int a,b,c,d,ad,ac,bc,bd;
 
	b = n % 10000000;
	a = n / 10000000;
	d = m % 10000000;
	c = m / 10000000;
	ad = a*d;
	ac = a*c;
	bc = b*c;
	bd = b*d;
	bc = (bc+ad)%M;
	a = bd%M;
	b = (bc*1000)%M;
	b = (b*10000)%M;
	c = (ac*1000)%M;
	c = (c*1000)%M;
	c = (c*10000)%M;
	c = (c*10000)%M;	
 
	return (a+b+c)%M;
}
 
int main()
{
	int t,n,k,i;
	long long int r,a,b,c,d,ad,bc,ac=0,bd=0;
 
	scanf("%d",&t);
 
	for(i=2;i<10007;i++)
		inv[i]=multi(i);
 
	cat[42] = 11901710849147;

	mot[9501] = 13184056090225;
	mot[9544] = 71003643347124;
	mot[9587] = 74703397202960;
	mot[9630] = 14804303829122;
	mot[9673] = 78739077656213;
	mot[9716] = 12072419930647;
	mot[9759] = 23039787351664;
	mot[9802] = 80137851135160;
	mot[9845] = 49148662812835;
	mot[9888] = 54714836624609;
	mot[9925] = 74023609407285;
	mot[9931] = 69150816514450;
	mot[9974] = 74402476111659;
 
	cat[0]=1;
	cat[1]=1;
	for(i=1;i<10001;i++)
	{
		r = inv[i+2];
		
		if(r==0)
			continue;
		else
		{
			a = (cat[i]*(2*(2*i+1)))%M;
			cat[i+1]=mul(a,r);
		}
	}
 
	mot[0]=1;
	mot[1]=1;
	mot[2]=2;
	for(i=2;i<10001;i++)
	{
		r = inv[i+3];
		if(r==0)
			continue;
		else
		{
			a = (((3*i)*mot[i-1])%M + ((2*i+3)*mot[i])%M)%M;
			mot[i+1]=mul(a,r);
		}
	}
 
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d %d",&n,&k);
		if(k>1)
		{
			if(n<3)	
			{
				printf("%d\n",n-1);
				continue;
			}
			if(cat[n]==0)	r=M;
			else		r=cat[n]-1;
			printf("%lld\n",r);
		}
		else if(k == 1)
		{
			if(n<3)	
				printf("%d\n",n-1);
			else 
			{
				if(mot[n]==0)	r=M;
				else		r=mot[n]-1;
				printf("%lld\n",r);
			}
		}
		else
			printf("0\n");
	}
 
	return 0;
}
